titleStmt.title: A letter concerning the present state of physick, and the regulation of the practice of it in this kingdom written to a doctor here in London.
titleStmt.author: T. M.
Merret, Christopher, 1614-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jo. Martyn and Ja. Allestry ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Christopher Merret by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
This item appears at reel 1016:18 as Wing M1837 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1725:54 as Wing M81C.
Reproduction of originals in the British and Bodleian Libraries.
